Here at CityTech CUNY, with strong collaboration and support from colleagues at Weill Cornell Medicine, we provide educational and research training opportunities to students enrolled in the Biomedical Informatics baccalaureate program (BIB), in a shared mission to prepare the next generation of innovators and visionaries in the field of Biomedical Big Data science.

Become a student researcher today!

Apply Today

Internships start in Summer 2018.

For more information, contact us at bigdata@citytech.cuny.edu

What BIB students can expect

  • Year-long paid training in Biomedical Big Data
  • Hands-on training sessions at City Tech
  • Summer bootcamp at Cornell
  • Internships at Cornell
  • Journal Club events
  • Annual student symposium on Biomedical Big Data at City Tech
